long_description: Capable of handling pavement and gravel paths, the versatile Diamondback Trace Sport Bike delivers an upright riding position, a bump-absorbing fork and 24 gears to get you on your way. Sturdy aluminum frame withstands the rigors of regular use; flat handlebar enables upright riding position for greater comfort and heads-up visibility. Suspension fork helps keep you in control and comfortable with 75mm of travel. 24 gear combinations ensure you're able to pedal comfortably no matter the gradient; reliable Shimano shifters and derailleurs make precise work of shifting. Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes supply all-weather stopping power. Sturdy double-walled rims are wrapped with Innova DualSport tires, which offer puncture resistance and can go from pavement to packed dirt or gravel paths with ease. Specs on the Diamondback Trace Sport bike are subject to change.
short_description: Capable of handling pavement and gravel paths, the versatile Diamondback Trace Sport Bike delivers an upright riding position, a bump-absorbing fork and 24 gears to get you on your way.
